channel.title: [RuneSource]Divinity
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/BsToL.png[/img][/center]
[B]Update:[/B] I'm waiting for Apollo to be released while I read up on Java to learn more on it before attempting a big project. This thread can be locked, as I won't be updating this anymore. Thanks.
[B]About me[/B] Hello. Firstly, I know what you're thinking, this guys new & this isn't going anywhere etc. etc., well I've been here since 07', just not publicly. And though 07 itself isn't much, I've been keeping up with RS private servers since cheezscape 80 (the one in castle wars where you thieve tables for gilded armor and dragon armor).
[B]Project[/B] I want to use RuneSource as a base because firstly it's a challenge for me, and secondly I know that my finishing product will be somewhat stable no matter what I change in it. I do have plans as to hosting this later on, but nowhere near in time. I will work alone on this.
I will post media as soon as I get shit done ;D.

item.title: [RuneSource]Divinity
item.dc:creator: @Wintercanon Wintercanon
item.description:
@Wintercanon wrote:

[quote=“skeppa77, post:4, topic:391593”][quote author=runewings317 link=topic=488753.msg3573526#msg3573526 date=1303241123]
Can you post more information on what your doing/what you want to do with it? Like post some things that others would find attractive. You need people to support your thread. When I see more information about what your doing I’ll support it.
[/quote]
I will soon.

Very nice, another person using RuneSource.

If you need assistance you should use StoneFall for reference.

I forgot to mention that I’m using Azure as the base, which is also a derivative of RuneSource, but more advanced than Stonefall (as it looks right now).[/quote]Azure has more content in it yes, but I wouldn’t call it more advanced than Stonefall.

Read full topic

item.title: [RuneSource]Divinity
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Glad to hear someone is attempting with another source, instead of using the over-used sources.

Read full topic

item.title: [RuneSource]Divinity
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

runewings317:

Sounds great! I never heard of RuneSource (last I knew Hyperion was the latest x3) so I hope its good!

RuneSource

If anyone else doesn’t know what RuneSource is click the name.

Read full topic

item.title: [RuneSource]Divinity
item.dc:creator: @skeppa77 skeppa77
item.description:
@skeppa77 wrote:

runewings317:

Sounds great! I never heard of RuneSource (last I knew Hyperion was the latest x3) so I hope its good!

From blakeman’s benchmark, it held 1,000 players with only 10% CPU Usage and 10M Ram on a 1(2?)GB computer.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @skeppa77 skeppa77
item.description:
@skeppa77 wrote:

runewings317:

Can you post more information on what your doing/what you want to do with it? Like post some things that others would find attractive. You need people to support your thread. When I see more information about what your doing I’ll support it.

I will soon.

[quote=“Clawz fury, post:3, topic:391593”]Very nice, another person using RuneSource.

If you need assistance you should use StoneFall for reference.[/quote]
I forgot to mention that I’m using Azure as the base, which is also a derivative of RuneSource, but more advanced than Stonefall (as it looks right now).

@skeppa77 wrote:

[center][/center]

Update: I’m waiting for Apollo to be released while I read up on Java to learn more on it before attempting a big project. This thread can be locked, as I won’t be updating this anymore. Thanks.

About me
Hello. Firstly, I know what you’re thinking, this guys new & this isn’t going anywhere etc. etc., well I’ve been here since 07’, just not publicly. And though 07 itself isn’t much, I’ve been keeping up with RS private servers since cheezscape 80 (the one in castle wars where you thieve tables for gilded armor and dragon armor).

Project
I want to use RuneSource as a base because firstly it’s a challenge for me, and secondly I know that my finishing product will be somewhat stable no matter what I change in it. I do have plans as to hosting this later on, but nowhere near in time. I will work alone on this.

I will post media as soon as I get shit done ;D.
